remarks: The Lebesgue outer measure function is finitely sub-additive.  (Unlike the stronger ~ ovoliun , this does not require any choice principles.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)
statement: ovolun $p |- ( ( ( A C_ RR /\ ( vol* ` A ) e. RR ) /\ ( B C_ RR /\ ( vol* ` B ) e. RR ) ) -> ( vol* ` ( A u. B ) ) <_ ( ( vol* ` A ) + ( vol* ` B ) ) ) $.
